::DrillBit::

DrillBit hoped they would reach the target soon, his drill was almost to
dull to cut through.

::Hot Rod::

"Hot Rod, maximize." Hot Rod turns to bot mode.
"We're not going anywhere untill you tell us you're buissness at the
Ark." Hot Rod thought for a sec.
"If you're looking for bots, there is nobody there."
